column4: I just installed Ubuntu 8.04 (not a new user though), and it worked fine until I tried installing the proprietary drivers..... now I get a black screen upon reboot, and no option to login ): Can anyone help me? :D
are you able to get to a console? (CTRL-alt-f1)
I can try, but I need to know what to do from there, as I'm on the same comp as my linux distro install.. can't have windows and nix up at the same time.
any ideas on how to fix then?
